collection:
As a company we always try to avoid collecting data, though
sometimes we do collect a small amount in order to offer you the services that
we do.

This page will outline the type of data we do collect, why we collect
it, and how you can request a copy of it.

### What data we collect

The personal data we collect from you includes:

  * questions, queries or feedback you leave, including your email address if you contact us
  * your email address when you sign up
  * OAuth access and refresh tokens from your Google account
  * the names of the spreadsheets you add in the Sheety dashboard, and corresponding identifiers
  * your Internet Protocol (IP) address, and details of which version of web browser you used
  * a log of how many times your API has been accessed

### What we do with your data

The data we collect may be shared with our technology suppliers, for example
our hosting provider.

We use Cloudflare Analytics to collect information about how you use our
websites.

Cloudflare Analytics processes anonymised information about:

  * the pages you visit on our websites
  * how long you spend on each of our website pages
  * how you got to the site
  * what you click on while you’re visiting the site

We will not identify you through analytics information, and we will not
combine analytics information with other data sets in a way that would
identify who you are.

Cloudflare will see:

  * the requests made to your API, including the POST/PUT body
  * the response from Sheety
  * the IP addresses of users accessing your API

### How long we keep your data

We will only retain your personal data for as long as:

  * it is needed for the purposes set out in this document
  * We will keep your email data until you unsubscribe.

We do not intentionally collect or maintain data
about anyone under the age of 13.
sharing:
### What data we collect

The personal data we collect from you includes:

  * questions, queries or feedback you leave, including your email address if you contact us
  * your email address when you sign up
  * OAuth access and refresh tokens from your Google account
  * the names of the spreadsheets you add in the Sheety dashboard, and corresponding identifiers
  * your Internet Protocol (IP) address, and details of which version of web browser you used
  * a log of how many times your API has been accessed

### What we do with your data

The data we collect may be shared with our technology suppliers, for example
our hosting provider.

We will not:

  * sell or rent your data to third parties
  * share your data with third parties for marketing purposes
  * We will share your data if we are required to do so by law - for example, by court order, or to prevent fraud or other crime.
